Transcription for 1221091

We started to go out. Now Maggie wasn't Jewish, so that was a bit awkward for me.
But we went out for nearly two years and I popped the question and she said yes. Her mother said
you shouldn't marry him, he's Jewish, as if I was a devil. We've been married on August the 26th
this year, 47 years. So her mother was completely wrong.
